text:
For three of the cvs tasks, cvs.exe is required in the path. Only one of the 
tasks is currently documented as requiring cvs.exe, in cvs.html.

Doc pages effected:
docs/manual/CoreTasks/changelog.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/cvs.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/cvstagdiff.html
